CustomField.description: Whether the current user is assigned to the task being viewed. This field may be inaccurate if a large number of resources are assigned to this task.
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(AND(MPM4_BASE__Resources_Assigned__c != null, OR(CONTAINS(MPM4_BASE__Resources_Assigned__c, $User.FirstName + ' ' + $User.LastName), CONTAINS(MPM4_BASE__Resources_Assigned__c, RIGHT($User.Id, 8)))), AND(MPM4_BASE__Resource__c != null, MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__User__c != null, MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__User__c == $User.Id)), true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Whether the current user is assigned to the task being viewed. This field may be inaccurate if a large number of resources are assigned to this task.
CustomField.label: My Task
